short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is made for job hunters to track their applications

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly track job opportunities and organize application details with Job Tracker for Notion! This Chrome extension integrates directly with your Notion account to simplify job hunting. Key features include:

1) Auto Job Detection: Automatically captures job details (company, role, location, etc.) from popular job sites like LinkedIn.
Resume Upload: Easily upload and attach your resume for each job

2) Notion Integration: Stores and organizes job information in your Notion workspace, keeping your job search process streamlined and centralized

3) Get organized, stay focused, and bring all your applications together in one place with Job Tracker for Notion
